alert.note: Alert for Rapides (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Rapides Parish through 1000 PM CDT... At 928 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elmer, or 10 miles east of Hineston, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lecompte, Elmer, Calcasieu, Woodworth, Forest Hill and Mcnary. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 62 and 74. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
